attributes.action: Government to cancel ratification of the eu treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the irish sinking the very unliked Eu Treaty to the bottom of the ocean along with the Titanic, it is time for the UK Goverment to lead by example and pull the plug of the EU treaty which is going through the house of lords at moment.after this the goverment goes back to the drawing board and gets the EU goverments to explain what the treaty will lead to and how far each goverment of the EU is willing to go.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
